channel.title: CVE Feed for Fedora Project Infrastructure -- Bodhi

item.title: CVE-2017-1002152|2024-08-05T22:08:11.510Z -- fedora%20project%20infrastructure -- bodhi
item.description: Bodhi 2.9.0 and lower is vulnerable to cross-site scripting resulting in code injection caused by incorrect validation of bug titles.
